name: shipment
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large amount of goods sent together to a place, or the act of sending them: A shipment of urgent medical supplies is expected to arrive very soon. Synonym
cargo

Add to word list
Add to word list
goods transported together, or the act of transporting them: [ C ] A shipment of vegetables arrived last week. [ U ] It was taken to the airport for shipment to Hawaii.
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] the act of sending goods somewhere: We are required to pay for the goods before shipment.
[ C ] goods that are being sent somewhere: It takes several days for a shipment to clear airport customs. They received food shipments from China.a shipment of sth They are waiting for a new shipment of grain. See also
bulk shipment
drop shipping
part shipment
transshipment
